description:
I’ve been studying how successful broadcasters have been delivering their scopes since the early days of Periscope. These people aren’t winging it. They are following a very specific formula that allows them to connect with their viewers, deliver their message, and get their audience to take action.

Want to know how it’s done?

I created this course to share everything that I’ve learned and implemented for successfully delivering scopes that make an impact on your audience. Many of the formulas and scripts that I teach in the course are the result of researching and analyzing hundreds of hours of the most popular broadcasts on Periscope.

Here’s what you’ll learn in this course:

● How to prepare for your scopes before you turn the camera on,

● How to write compelling scope descriptions that make viewers eager to watch,

● How to create the perfect 4­-part introduction

● The transition script that will boost your number of live viewers and followers

● 5 effective templates for structuring the main content of your scope, and

● The essential 3-Part "power wrap-up" that will help you establish rapport with your viewers and drive traffic to your website, email list, or other social media channels.

● Plus all of my best tips and strategies for delivering Periscope broadcasts like a pro.
title: The Periscope Business Marketing Formula
